item.title: CabritoBot
item.description: Mission Easy generation or integration of prebuilt packages. It helps fetchs prebuilt binaries from github releases. Generate a prebuilt package Create new project npm init Add this package as dependency npm install any-prebuilt --save Create postinstall.js file with content: require('any-prebuilt').install(require('./package.json').prebuilt) Create index.js file with content: var anyPrebuilt = require('any-prebuilt') anyPrebuilt.initialize(__dirname, require('./package.json').prebuilt) module.exports.path = anyPrebuilt.path On the package.
